title: User Settings Migration: Productize Okta Token Migration Prototype
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with the legacy MLB app on their device
AND the user is logged with a valid MLB.com login

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user upgrades the app to the rewrite
AND the user opens the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user maintains logged in state on the rewrite

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes the app 
AND the user opens the app again
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be presented with the default start page
AND the user will not be presented with the onboarding flow again

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user attempts to access media associated with the entitlements tied to their account
AND the user attempts this in both web and native views
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should be able to view the media appropriate to their account entitlements

title: Hide Scores migrates on upgrade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on an older version of the app (legacy for the current test. Alter this text in future releases)
AND the user notes whether Hide Scores/Hide Spoilers is on or off in the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user upgrades to the most recent version of the app
custom_expected: THEN the setting should be preserved from the version from which the user upgraded (test both On and Off Scenarios)

title: Favorite team sync after upgrade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user logged into the app as one user with favorite team x
AND they log out and log into the app as another user with favorite team y

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they check their favorite team in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it shall be favorite team x

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they log into the web and check their favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it shall be favorite team x

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they change their favorite team from the web to team z
AND wait at least 5 minutes for the cache to expire
AND the app is restarted (do not log out)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will show favorite team z

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they change their favorite team from the app back to team x
AND they check their account on the web
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the web will reflect favorite team x
